questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

A company is evaluating threat protection solutions of Microsoft 365.

The solution must meet the following requirements:

• Act as a gatekeeper between the hosted applications and the end user
• Work gatekeeper between the hosted of the end user
• Work regardless of the device of the end user

Which solution should you deploy?

Select the answer that correctly completes the sentence.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Some of the requirements seem to be missing words but Cloud Apps seem correct
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/security/defender/eval-defender-mcas-architecture?view=o365-worldwide

Y Y N
The 3rd statement is false. The Identity Secure Score in the Microsoft Entra admin center focuses on identity-related recommendations, such as multifactor authentication, blocking legacy authentication, and protecting user accounts. It does not specifically include recommendations for Exchange Online.

For the first two
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/security/defender/microsoft-secure-score?view=o365-worldwide
YY
Third one
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/identity/monitoring-health/concept-identity-secure-score

I think it's N

comments.content: Microsoft Entra Admin Center is not the portal that deals with Exchange online.
and in the little video (I recommend it) in the link above it shows your how your score compare with similar organisations, for the second answer

The reason for me it's a No for the third is because it says from "MS Entra Center" and this info is available in Defender Portal
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/security/defender/microsoft-secure-score?view=o365-worldwide

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

A company is evaluating Microsoft 365 threat protection solutions.

For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
The correct answer is C. automated investigation and response (AIR).

This component in Microsoft 365 Defender is designed to filter alerts and recommend actions that the security team can approve or reject. It automates the investigation process, identifies threats, and provides actionable recommendations, streamlining the response to security incidents.

I think it's Threat Analytics not 100% sure:
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/security/defender/threat-analytics?view=o365-worldwide

comments.content:
yeah TA always confused me, there is a good little video on this article
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/security/defender/threat-analytics?view=o365-worldwide

questions.question_text:
A company is using Microsoft 365 Defender.

The company requires the ability to filter alerts and recommend actions that a security team can approve or reject.

You need to identify the component that filters and recommends actions.

Which component should you use?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: E
The Microsoft Enterprise Agreement (EA) is designed for organizations that want to license software and cloud services for a minimum three-year period. 
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/identify-licensing-options-available-microsoft-365/2-cloud-solution-provider-model
Misleading because there's no size listed of the company. You can't just assume it's 500+ and pick Enterprise. Poorly worded and incorrect answer.

comments.content: I guess it is correct, but only if the company has 500+ users. In other case I would choose CSP

questions.question_text:
A company plans to purchase a Microsoft 365 subscription.

The company must license Microsoft 365 software and cloud services for a minimum three-year period.

You need to identify which pricing model supports the licensing requirements.

Which pricing model should you use?

A company purchases Microsoft 365 subscription directly.

The company is evaluating various support options that do not have additional costs for Microsoft 365 services.

You need to identify which support options are provided at no additional cost.

Which options should you identify? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
